verses.verse: The proverbs <S%H4912><s%> of Solomon <S%H8010><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>
To know <S%H3045><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and instruction, <S%H4148><s%> To discern <S%H995><s%> the sayings <S%H561><s%> of understanding, <S%H998><s%>
To receive <S%H3947><s%> instruction <S%H4148><s%> in wise <S%H7919><s%> behavior, <S%H7919><s%> Righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> and equity; <S%H4339><s%>
To give <S%H5414><s%> prudence <S%H6195><s%> to the naive, <S%H6612><s%> To the youth <S%H5288><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%> and discretion, <S%H4209><s%>

A wise <S%H2450><s%> man <S%H2450><s%> will hear <S%H8085><s%> and increase <S%H3254><s%> in learning, <S%H3948><s%> And a man of understanding <S%H995><s%> will acquire <S%H7069><s%> wise <S%H8458><s%> counsel, <S%H8458><s%>
To understand <S%H995><s%> a proverb <S%H4912><s%> and a figure, <S%H4426><s%> The words <S%H1697><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> and their riddles. <S%H2420><s%>
The fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of knowledge; <S%H1847><s%> Fools <S%H191><s%> despise <S%H936><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and instruction. <S%H4148><s%>
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> my son, <S%H1121><s%> your father's instruction, <S%H4148><s%> And do not forsake <S%H5203><s%> your mother's teaching; <S%H8451><s%>
Indeed, <S%H3588><s%> they are a graceful <S%H2580><s%> wreath <S%H3880><s%> to your head, <S%H7218><s%> And ornaments <S%H6060><s%> about your neck. <S%H1621><s%>
My son, <S%H1121><s%> if <S%H518><s%> sinners <S%H2400><s%> entice <S%H6601><s%> you, Do not consent. <S%H14><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> they say, <S%H559><s%> "Come <S%H1980><s%> with us, Let us lie <S%H693><s%> in wait <S%H693><s%> for blood, <S%H1818><s%> Let us ambush <S%H6845><s%> the innocent <S%H9345><s%> without <S%H2600><s%> cause; <S%H2600><s%>
Let us swallow <S%H1104><s%> them alive <S%H2416><s%> like Sheol, <S%H7585><s%> Even whole, <S%H8549><s%> as those who go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit; <S%H953><s%>
We shall find <S%H4672><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> [kinds] of precious <S%H3368><s%> wealth, <S%H1952><s%> We shall fill <S%H4390><s%> our houses <S%H1004><s%> with spoil; <S%H7998><s%>
Throw <S%H5307><s%> in your lot <S%H1486><s%> with us, We shall all <S%H3605><s%> have <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H259><s%> purse, <S%H3599><s%> "
My son, <S%H1121><s%> do not walk <S%H1980><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> with them. Keep <S%H4513><s%> your feet <S%H7272><s%> from their path, <S%H9350><s%>
For their feet <S%H7272><s%> run <S%H7323><s%> to evil, <S%H9563><s%> And they hasten <S%H4116><s%> to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood. <S%H1818><s%>
Indeed, <S%H3588><s%> it is useless <S%H2600><s%> to spread <S%H2219><s%> the net <S%H7568><s%> In the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> bird <S%H1167><s%>; <S%H3671><s%>
But they lie <S%H693><s%> in wait <S%H693><s%> for their own blood; <S%H1818><s%> They ambush <S%H6845><s%> their own lives. <S%H5315><s%>

So <S%H3651><s%> are the ways <S%H734><s%> of everyone <S%H3605><s%> who gains <S%H1214><s%> by violence; <S%H1214><s%> It takes <S%H3947><s%> away the life <S%H5315><s%> of its possessors. <S%H1167><s%>
Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> shouts <S%H7442><s%> in the street, <S%H2351><s%> She lifts <S%H5414><s%> her voice <S%H6963><s%> in the square; <S%H7339><s%>

At the head <S%H7218><s%> of the noisy <S%H1993><s%> [streets] she cries <S%H7121><s%> out; At the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gates <S%H8179><s%> in the city, <S%H5892><s%> she utters <S%H559><s%> her sayings: <S%H561><s%>

"How <S%H4970><s%> long, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> O naive <S%H6612><s%> ones, <S%H6612><s%> will you love <S%H157><s%> simplicity <S%H9467><s%>? And scoffers <S%H9238><s%> delight <S%H2530><s%> themselves in scoffing, <S%H3944><s%> And fools <S%H3684><s%> hate <S%H8130><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>?

"Turn <S%H7725><s%> to my reproof, <S%H9640><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will pour <S%H5042><s%> out my spirit <S%H7307><s%> on you; I will make <S%H3045><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> to you.

"Because <S%H3282><s%> I called, <S%H7121><s%> and you refused; <S%H3985><s%> I stretched <S%H5186><s%> out my hand, <S%H3027><s%> and no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> paid <S%H7181><s%> attention; <S%H7181><s%>
And you neglected <S%H6544><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my counsel, <S%H6098><s%> And did not want <S%H14><s%> my reproof; <S%H9640><s%>
I will even <S%H1571><s%> laugh <S%H7832><s%> at your calamity; <S%H343><s%> I will mock <S%H3932><s%> when your dread <S%H6343><s%> comes, <S%H935><s%>

When your dread <S%H6343><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> like a storm, <S%H7584><s%> And your calamity <S%H343><s%> comes <S%H857><s%> on like a whirlwind, <S%H5492><s%> When distress <S%H6869><s%> [and] anguish <S%H9474><s%> come <S%H935><s%> on you.
"Then <S%H227><s%> they will call <S%H7121><s%> on me, but I will not answer; <S%H6030><s%> They will seek <S%H7836><s%> me diligently, <S%H7836><s%> but they shall not find <S%H4672><s%> me,
Because <S%H8478><s%> <S%H3588><s%> they hated <S%H8130><s%> knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> And did not choose <S%H977><s%> the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
"They would <S%H14><s%> not accept <S%H14><s%> my counsel, <S%H6098><s%> They spurned <S%H5006><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my reproof. <S%H9640><s%>
"So they shall eat <S%H398><s%> of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of their own way, <S%H1870><s%> And be satiated <S%H7646><s%> with their own devices. <S%H4156><s%>
"For the waywardness <S%H4878><s%> of the naive <S%H6612><s%> shall kill <S%H2026><s%> them, And the complacency <S%H7962><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%> shall destroy them.
"But he who listens <S%H8085><s%> to me shall live <S%H7931><s%> securely, <S%H983><s%> And shall be at ease <S%H7599><s%> from the dread <S%H6343><s%> of evil. <S%H9567><s%>"
